data.name: Daraney - Guardian's Rise
data.detailed_description:
Daraney - Guardian's Rise

Fyrea, a young half-dragon girl who lost both of her parents at a young age, strifes to become a
fully-fledged member of the "Dragon Guardians" to step into the footsteps of her father,
who fell while protecting the village and its inhabitants 15 years ago. In order to fulfill her
goal, she will have to overcome a variety of exams, riddles and battles so she
can receive her own unique guardian weapon. But the land of "Daraney" holds many dangers that
begin to take any necessary action in order to awaken an ancient,
powerful creature that once came close to destroying the whole world and with it all of its inhabitants.

While there are evil forces that work toward the awakening of that creature,
there is also an organization that does everything it is capable of to prevent the revival
of the evil god. But will they succeed in doing so?
And will Fyrea be able to take part in fighting those evil forces?

Features of "Daraney - Guardian's Rise" :

1. - 20+ hours of gameplay
2. - Turn-based battle system
3. - Arte learning system (You won't learn artes automatically upon leveling up, instead you'll have to learn them manually)
4. - Enjoyable story and lots of side content such as quests, dungeons and other areas
5. - The "Sign-System" can trigger various buffs or debuffs during battle once stacked up and triggered
6. - Quest Log
7. - Interactive objects such as stone plates, maps, flowers and so on
8. - Additional characters to unlock
9.- The game will receive additional content updates from time to time, such as new dungeons, quests, areas and so on
10. - Level-Up your artes by making use of the mastery system in order to make them stronger and reduce their needed resources
11. - ... And many more!

data.short_description: Fyrea, a young half-dragon girl who lost both of her parents at a young age, strifes to become a fully-fledged member of the "Dragon Guardians" to step into the footsteps of her father, who fell while protecting the village and its inhabitants 15 years ago.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7,8,10
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics cards
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9 compliant
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7,8,10
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics cards
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9 compliant
